progressWeights.description: Limited market validation with some funding evidence but no customer contact
progressWeights.rationale: Government grant funding (€20,000) and 6-month operational funding secured, plus ML demos and prototypes completed, but no customer interviews or revenue validation
keyAchievements: ML demos completed for core technology
Basic prototypes for dashboard and app developed
mainGaps: No customer discovery or market research conducted
No revenue validation or paying customers
No market testing with healthcare providers

progressWeights.description: Clear problem definition and solution approach with well-defined target market
progressWeights.rationale: Well-articulated problem (chronic wound management for healthcare providers), clear multimodal solution approach, and defined target customers, but lacks specific success metrics
keyAchievements: Clear problem statement: chronic wound management for healthcare providers
Well-defined solution: multimodal platform with app/dashboard
Specific target customers: smaller outpatient clinics and hospitals
Long-term vision: end-to-end platform for all caregivers
mainGaps: Value proposition could be more specific

progressWeights.description: Strong co-founder team with complementary medical and technical expertise
progressWeights.rationale: Excellent combination of medical doctor (medical informatics) and ML expert (startup/scaleup experience), with strong network connections and firsthand patient experience
keyAchievements: Medical doctor co-founder with medical informatics specialization
Strong VC and influential network connections
Firsthand patient experience with chronic wounds

progressWeights.description: Basic SaaS model defined with some validation through funding
progressWeights.rationale: Clear SaaS subscription model with monthly subscriptions, government funding validation, but no pricing strategy or unit economics defined
mainGaps: No unit economics (CAC, LTV, margins unknown)

progressWeights.description: General market interest indicated but limited market research
progressWeights.rationale: Healthcare system strain creates clear need, growing digital health trends, but no market size data or customer segment analysis provided
keyAchievements: Healthcare system strain creates immediate need
mainGaps: No market size data (TAM, SAM unknown)

progressWeights.description: Good differentiation through multimodal approach but limited competitive analysis
progressWeights.rationale: Unique multimodal data integration (wound images, lab data, smartwatch data) provides strong differentiation, but no direct competitor analysis or defensible moats identified

tasks.description: Conduct customer discovery interviews with 15+ healthcare providers
tasks.outcome: Validated problem understanding and customer needs

tasks.description: Test willingness to pay with potential customers
tasks.outcome: Validated pricing model and revenue potential

successCriteria: Pricing model validated with target customers
riskMitigation: Focus on smaller clinics first (easier to access)
Offer free trials to reduce customer risk

tasks.outcome: Clear regulatory pathway and compliance plan

tasks.description: Enhance prototypes based on customer feedback
tasks.outcome: Functional MVP ready for pilot testing

successCriteria: Pilot program ready for healthcare providers
riskMitigation: Build compliance into product from start

estimatedTimeToCompletion: 8-12 months to sustainable revenue and product-market fit
criticalPath: Conduct customer discovery with healthcare providers
Enhance MVP based on customer feedback
Launch pilot program with paying customers
Validate unit economics and scale sales team
